website_summaries.verdict: These dodgeballs take the sting out of the game and put kids and adults on equal footing.
pros: Don't hurt even when thrown hard
Coated with patented Rhino Skin so they're rip-resistant for rough play
Low-density core prevents big bounces so the ball stays in the game area
Comes in a variety of colors and sizes
Won't sting like classic rubber balls
Easier for younger children to catch and throw
cons: May not meet official size standards for your dodgeball league, so check carefully before ordering

customer_reviews.title: I love these. I've ordered them from Rhino before
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I've ordered them from Rhino before. These may be from rhino, but they aren't nearly as durable as the ones I've had previously. I've used them approximately 24 times and 2 already have ripped covers. Granted, we're not gentle with them, and it may have caught on something without my knowing. That aside, the covers are not as sturdy as the older set I still have. But for dodgeball, they're perfect because they don't hurt! (Okay, still stings if you get it in the face.)
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but really worth it - Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: These are expensive, but they are worth the purchase. We've played at least 20 games of dodgeball so far with two sets of these balls. They still look brand new and we played the games outside. I would definitely buy these again and recommend them to anyone looking for a lasting set of dodgeball balls. Also, these are great with little kids. We've had NO TEARS so far and we've had people playing from 3 to 50.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: So light they don't knock over lamps
customer_reviews.text: The price seemed a bit steep at first, compared to other balls of the same size, but they're really good quality and perfect for dodge ball. (It was about $60 for set of 6.) They are extremely light and so do not hurt when they hit you. My son and his friends have played with them every day since they arrived at our home. The weather hasn't allowed them to play outside yet, so they play indoors. The balls are so light they don't damage anything inside. Very colorful too. (Bonus: our 2 cats don't appear interested in them--they're too big for cats to play with.) If I need more I will buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Greta N

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: These do not last long. The skin rips easy and the foam seems to break down quickly. I have only had these for less than half a school year and use them with K-6 students. I would recommend the go sports brand ball. I bought them at the same time and they all look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynnsmom

customer_reviews.title: Great set. Worth it over the harder rubber playground balls.
customer_reviews.text: We love these dodgeballs. I thought that we would prefer the larger size, but we have 3 kids (9,6,and 4) and I feel like these are easier for them to throw. But they are plenty big enough for adult hands as well. They have enough to them that you can get a good throw, but they are soft enough to throw at the kids as hard as we want without hurting anyone. :) Excellent quality, and we just bought another set to add to our collection.
customer_reviews.author: Moulton11

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR DODGEBALL!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT IN EVERY WAY! These balls are great color, feel, and size. Soft, but still substantial enough in weight to reach target. Outer shell is smooth coating on a slightly textured ball, and sturdy. We have used these many times with teenagers and adults, and no one gets seriously hurt. If these do happen to hit above the neck they are soft enough no serious injury or pain will occur. Pay attention to size when ordering. Mine are slightly smaller than a volleyball or soccer ball. Great buy if you love dodge ball these are a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Mothers complete stamp of approval
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect dodgeballs. They don't have to be blown up because it's skin covering foam. I have tried to get my teenage sons to hang out at my house. These are so perfect that I purchased another set. It worked (so far).My teenage sons and their friends want to hang out at my house! (Praying it continues ) I actually play with my sons. Nothing tells you faster that you are out of shape then a game of dodgeball with your kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dodge ball
customer_reviews.text: Great for dodge ball. My students love using these balls. They don't hurt like the typical playground rubber balls that are filled with air. These are foam, they are heavy enough to throw hard, but they don't have that sting to them. Perfect for striking games where you have young children that don't like to get hit too hard, You hear a nice thump sound when you achieve a solid hit. They have held up for a year now and are still in near perfect shape. I'd buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have for any youth group. i like the 6" better for Junior High and High School students, easier and much more fun to throw. Some of us can get some real speed behind these, and with no fear since they really don't hurt when you get hit (i was hit in the face four times this past sunday but some high school seniors who can really throw.) So far they seem very durable. I have only used them indoors. i plan to give them plenty of use between Jr High and High schoolers...so i will update if anything goes wrong. Kids love them, i love them. great buy.
customer_reviews.author: SRoop

customer_reviews.title: Skin gets loose & rips easily
customer_reviews.text: These balls are okay because they are low bounce and don't hurt as much when taking a head shot. However, while you're playing with them, the foam will compress but the skin won't. This wasn't a problem at first but the skin will then rip and there is no way to fix them. At first it was only one ball so I thought it was okay but now, I only have 2 in good condition left. I wish the skin was more tough because I've only had them for a month.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: My sons love them!
customer_reviews.text: They were smaller than I expected, but my 13 year old sons say that they are the perfect size for throwing and catching with one hand. They don't hurt as much as playground balls when you get hit with them (so they tell me) and most importantly the spikey, ball-devouring bush next door has no effect on them because they are foam filled. They even inspired my kids to finally write their thank-you notes from Christmas (because I wouldn't let them play with them until they thanked the uncle who sent the Amazon gift cards).
customer_reviews.author: Jorgette

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We used these for a neighborhood dodgeball tournament held on our tennis courts. We played for hours and honestly the balls still look pretty new. It wasn't from a lack of hard throws either, had a few ex baseball players playing. But even with a hit from a smoking fastball, they don't really hurt. We didn't allow of course little kids to play with big kids/adults but all ages enjoyed them. Recommend getting a mesh bag to carry them around. Fun times!
customer_reviews.author: Hud

customer_reviews.title: Kids love playing dodgeball with these!
customer_reviews.text: Our two sons love playing with these dodgeballs. While other reviewers noted that they are small, they are the perfect size for kids (and me - mom). We play in the backyard at least once a week and the neighborhood kids come around to play too. If you get smacked by one, it doesn't hurt a bit (even if right on the nose). This was a birthday gift for our son and while it was more than we wanted to spend for a toy, it is well used and seem like they will last a while. (Purchased in December 2011). This will get your family active...Play Ball!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but work well and durable
customer_reviews.text: These balls are a little bit harder than the ones I used when I worked at a residential group home for children. They have a coating painted on the balls. Seem more durable than the ones with a layer of skin over the ball. Overall I am pleased. I use them with young kids and nobody seems to get hurt unless they get hit in the face which can hurt with just about any ball. They are more aerodynamic than foam balls so they are better for games like dodge ball or jailbreak.
customer_reviews.author: James Hanenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Dodge balls...great quality and you can really pelt someone with satisfaction, but without hurting them!! Great for frustrated parents...lol
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Alspach

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun! We love to play Dodgeball with our kids.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Great for dodgeball!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft and perfect for dodgeball. I've seen lots of kids even take them in the face and they're more than fine...and still wanting to play! These are a bit expensive, but worth it if you're looking for a soft, squishy ball. These don't bounce, but they are easy to throw and fly straight. If you're looking for an alternative to the rubber ball, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Youth Group Dodgeball
customer_reviews.text: I'm a youth pastor, and during our services we usually break for a game. We've used the rubber, larger balls often, but in an indoor environment, with lots of kids, it makes it tough. those big ones can sting if you get hit the right way. These are smaller, have great distance, are squeezable (so you can get a good grip), and although they smack you pretty good, they won't leave a bright red mark on your face (or the church wall) should you be so unfortunate as to get smacked there. I use these at church, in schools, and in other groups of students. I'll probably order another pack to have a second set on hand.
customer_reviews.author: csalzillo

customer_reviews.title: Multi Purpose/Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this 6" size to mix in for standard dodgeball games, however my active 2 year old boy has also had some great fun with these. They're very durable, hard outer skin that can withstand bouncing over wooden, sand and concrete surfaces. The 6" size is perfect for little hands and easy on the interior of your house. Great for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: 8i8

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 Sets (1 Blue Ball Arrived Damaged)
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two sets of these for our dodgeball league in Canada while on vacation in Florida. Unfortunately, one of the 12 balls arrived damaged (punctured). Is it possible to replace the one ball? Returning this order due to one damaged ball seems a little much.
customer_reviews.author: Joey&Laura

customer_reviews.title: breakdown fast
customer_reviews.text: I run a dodgeball league and they only last about 3 weeks of the season before they need to be replaced. the skin rips and it loses its form. Pretty pricey for such a short lifespan
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rhino Skin Dodge Balls are great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these balls to use in our Children's and Youth ministries at our Church. There reason is because these are a little harder then foam balls but if a child gets hit with one they are very forgiving. They do not sting like a dodge ball but give you the stiffness to lets you throw them hard. I would highly recommend these if you are looking for what I would consider the "safest" dodge ball that you can by.
customer_reviews.author: C.McCoy

customer_reviews.title: They worked great. They don't hurt too much when you're hit ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a dodge ball tournament for high school. They worked great. They don't hurt too much when you're hit with them but still have enough weight to be able to aim.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR DODGE BALL- NO STING!
customer_reviews.text: These balls are a great find. No sting on impact, soft inside, coated outer shell. Have the right weight and design to throw and hit your target. Perfect for playing safe and having fun. Seems pretty durable and well made. Pay attention to the size you want to order or you may get smaller than you want. I ordered the 6" and they are slightly smaller than your average play ground ball. These do not bounce- not made for that.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Rhino Skin Dodgeball
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 6 inch rhino skin balls and they have worked out great for throwing and catching games for 6 months so far. The 6 inch proved to be a great size for 1st – 3rd perfect for small hands and also work for 4th – 6th graders. They objects are soft enough that no damage is done to a child who gets hit. Holding up well with indoor and outdoor use on grass. The balls are extremely light so accuracy won’t be as great as a rubber ball but obviously much safer than rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good wuality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic dodgeballs for youth group. They hold up pretty well considering
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kainz

customer_reviews.title: Very good durable Dodgeballs for Youth Group
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these dodge balls for our middle school youth group to throw every wed night before service in the gym. They have held up very well over the past 4 months with no tares. I feel for the value, the 6in version of these balls are more worth it because you get more balls for less $, however these balls are just as good. They just cost allot. You do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Leafgreen

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them.
customer_reviews.text: We host a dodgeball tournament every Labor Day to raise money for our school's wrestling team. These were our second set of dodge balls and the kids loved them. They were easy to grip and throw plus the skin with foam core make them less painful to get hit with. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Dodgeballs
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect dodgeballs. The 8-inch size makes it hard for most people to palm & throw with velocity so it makes it a little "safer" than the 6-inch variety. Also, the rhino skin is very durable and won't flake off like most other protective coating.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Kalicki

customer_reviews.title: my son and his friend enjoyed it very much
customer_reviews.text: i gave this to the kids school, apparently the school only allow foam ball low impact for dodge ball, exactly the same kinds the school was using except they were all beat up and duck tape over the, that why i donated them to the school. my son and his friend enjoyed it very much. Great for dodge balls.
customer_reviews.author: L. WAI

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: The dodge balls were nice but I don’t understand why I can only return these for 30 days. I’ve written the company and told them that we have not opened the dodge balls and that I want one size smaller. Will return at my expense. . But they do not reply!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for church youth group in small gym - war ball!
customer_reviews.text: Here's what I really like about these balls: 1. Despite being light weight you can throw them plenty hard. 2. They fly straight - no wiffeling or knuckling. 3. Even when getting hit hard at close range they don't hurt or sting. Our church youth aged 11 to 18 love these. We've only used them a couple times, so I can't speak to their durability. However, the "skin" on them fells very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Morring

customer_reviews.title: Awesome balls!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I am a Scoutmaster with the Boy Scouts and dodgeball is a reward we use when they want a game. These are sturdy. Evenly padded, evenly weighted, and fly straight. The shell seems strong. If it can withstand scouts, it can withstand most anything. Also comes with the convenient carrying bag. Nothing special, but keeps them in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, pretty colors!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, good quality dodge balls. They are definitely smaller than what we used in the 80s & 90s, and not nearly as fun (no rewarding "thump" when you hit your target). They are meant to palm and throw, and soft enough to do no damage. We bought these for our older elementary kids to play a tournament with, and they held up great -- should last a while!
customer_reviews.author: JGug

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Our youth group lives these and they seem to hold up pretty well!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Mills

customer_reviews.title: and they have held up wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: These are expensive (there are 6 in this set) but definitely worth the extra money if you want a product that will last. We use these for warm up games occasionally at my crossfit gym, and they have held up wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Bair

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for kids and I highly recommend them. As for adults, they are a little soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie T

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. (But on second thought. . .) Updated June 4, 2018
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last month for my son's birthday party as an activity in the gym. Durable and sting is at a reduced level. Really glad I purchased them. Now I regret it. Only 6 months in the balls became smaller but the cover didn't. Then they tore. Nothing like the Gator Skin dodgeballs which seems better.
customer_reviews.author: W. Irvin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Blue Balls
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product a year ago, and got the multi-colored set. Today I got my second order of this - and they are all blue. This is not a joke. I'm not trying to be funny. They are all blue balls. So, not red, orange, yellow, green, blue or purple...they are all blue. UPDATE: I ordered another set, and they came in the rainbow colors. So I'm guessing it was a fluke or just hit or miss.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Walker Cleaveland

customer_reviews.title: Best in the dodgeball industry
customer_reviews.text: Rhinoskin dodgeballs are the best dodgeball in the industry for kids. They used to only be available through one specialty store. When we found them online through Amazon at Champion Sports, it was a great savings. They made the ordering and delivery fast and simple. My kids love them. Nice job. David Spatz Jertex Networks / First Baptist Church [...]
customer_reviews.author: David W. Spatz

customer_reviews.title: kids love these balls
customer_reviews.text: Using for dodgeball games with elementary children. Soft enough that we are not going to have kids freaking out when they get hit. Unlike foam balls, the Rhino skin is tough and doesn't peel off. Kids have a lot of fun whenever we use these balls as it takes the fear of pain out of the equation.
customer_reviews.author: ccpff

customer_reviews.title: these are legit tournament dodge balls. I don't understand ...
customer_reviews.text: these are legit tournament dodge balls. I don't understand how they throw so well and are so soft at the same time, but they do.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for work and the students love playing with them! Great velocity without a sting.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M

customer_reviews.title: Good but expensive!
customer_reviews.text: These dodgeballs were purchased for our intramural program. They are small standard dodgeballs. I just don't understand why they are so expensive! I would purchase more but I have to wait for another semester to get funding.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Begay

customer_reviews.title: ... dodgeball games against the faculty and they are the perfect size. They are easy to grip and throw
customer_reviews.text: I use these for high school dodgeball games against the faculty and they are the perfect size. They are easy to grip and throw. They are soft when anyone gets hit. They do tend to rip a little easily and chip after a couple of rounds or games.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Dodge the Rhino Skin Balls
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware. Looks good initially, breaks down after 6 months of use. Shoplet responded to my complaint by sending me to Champion, Champion sent me back to Shoplet. Amazon has also reached out to Shoplet on our behalf and there still hasn't been a response since sending us to Champion. I cannot recommend buying these balls, they are not durable and customer service from both the third party seller (Shoplet) and the manufacturer (Champion) is poor.
customer_reviews.author: James Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great for blacklight dodgeball!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for dodgeball. We use them with blacklights and the neon yellow reflects the UV light the best. Neon orange works really well too, but just not quite as bright. Very good quality. We have used the same set of balls for 4 years now, using them about 2x a year for a blacklight dodgeball tournament with about 700 kids using them each tournament. Not ONE has torn or busted and these high school students throw these so hard that the almost whistle going through the air!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dodgeball
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are great for dodgeball or anything else where people are throwing balls at each other. They are soft to where they don't hurt, but dense enough so you can throw them. They squish, but keep their shape.
customer_reviews.author: Texan4Life

customer_reviews.title: Good old fashioned butt kicking fun.
customer_reviews.text: My friends of all ages enjoy these dodgeballs from 1 years old to 60. Everyone has been hit in the face at least 100 times with these balls and no one was physically hurt. (pride yes...face no) My nephew and his friends went crazy with these at his birthday party. He turned 6 last week. Tons of fun for non-helicopter parents.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Dodgeballs in the World
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing dodgeball at the National level for years and these are the dodgeballs being used in just about every league in the world (except the UK). The 7" are WDF-regulation size, they have a good skin for grip, can take a beating, and it doesn't hurt if you happen to take a headshot.
customer_reviews.author: C. F.

customer_reviews.title: These dodge balls are amazing! They may seem expensive
customer_reviews.text: These dodge balls are amazing! They may seem expensive, but think about it, you'd pay more than $10 in the store for any kind of ball. These balls will last a very long time. We are very rough with this balls as they are thrown very hard and they hit sharp edges with out getting damaged or hurting anyone. Just get them! And no I do not work for Rhino, I work at a church.
customer_reviews.author: bdoty

customer_reviews.title: Just what the kids ordered.
customer_reviews.text: My son has been asking me to find the 'dodgeball' balls like they play with in PE (high school), the ones that don't hurt when you get hit with them no matter who is throwing it. These are them! They are small enough that they can be gripped with one hand, but larger than a softball. They seem to be well made and durable. I hope so, the price seemed a bit steep to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.....
customer_reviews.text: These did not meet an expectation. I was not informed through the description that they had to be blown up and was expecting them to be a low bounce, which they are not. I needed up having to go somewhere else for the right kind. It took two orders to try and get the item I needed and it did not work out.
customer_reviews.author: molly niemann

customer_reviews.title: They feel good in your hand
customer_reviews.text: These are the dodge balls you are looking for. They feel good in your hand, fly hard and straight, make a satisfying sound when they hit someone...and yet don't hurt, even when you are getting pegged from close range.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Yancey

customer_reviews.title: Too slick!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these six-inch balls for my 5 year old to play with indoors without worrying too much about damaging stuff/himself. While they are great for tossing around at each other, they are very slick. I have smaller hands and have trouble gripping them due to they slippery material and coating on them. The foam is a bit dense and doesn't have as much of a "memory foam" type of feel. I've played with gatorskin balls and they have much better feel, tackiness, and are easier to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: greendragon4

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for kids...  Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The balls were perfect. We used them for my kids' Fitness Challenge kick off event to get the kids pumped up. They were a hit. Ages for the kids were K - 8th. The balls are perfect size and nobody was hurt because of their soft foam. The price was great as I saw other at large sporting goods stores for more than double the price. I bought two sets. Thanks to others who gave these balls a great review.
customer_reviews.author: 57Belair

customer_reviews.title: So much fun...
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it. Easy to throw on a line. Doesn't hurt my 5 year old twins when I bean them in the head. All good. Just don't run over with your car, they will explode.
customer_reviews.author: Sparks

customer_reviews.title: They are firm but not hard and the teenagers love them.
customer_reviews.text: This set was bought to replace another set that was stolen. I bought the larger 8 inch balls this time. They are firm but not hard and the teenagers love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults too
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to add variety to my unit physical training sessions. The balls seem a little light at first but you are still able to throw them with significant speed and force. One of our guys had one of these balls wrap around his head from being thrown so hard. Fun times to be had by all...
customer_reviews.author: Sap

customer_reviews.title: these are the best dodgeballs on the market
customer_reviews.text: these are the best dodgeballs on the market. i run a dodgeball camp and used to run a dodgeball club in college and we always used these. fly fast and straight yet don't actually hurt people.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Tough and soft
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the Youth Group so that no one gets hurt. They are awesome and the rhino lining has lasted a long time with lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: lane

customer_reviews.title: but too big to really throw like a baseball
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for. They are the soft dodgeballs that people use now. They are just big enough that you can throw them with one hand, but too big to really throw like a baseball. Even when you take a shot to the face, they don't hurt too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Last Long. Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Perfect for our dodgeball tournaments. We have Bought these for the last few years and they hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: funtimes

customer_reviews.title: Used them right away for family gathering indoor gym dodgeball ...
customer_reviews.text: Used them right away for family gathering indoor gym dodgeball. Balls were safe for smaller children. The skin covering is fragile against sharp objects.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: They're great when they don't rip.
customer_reviews.text: They get worn out pretty quick and then they rip. But when they're new, my kids and I love them. They don't hurt like regular rubber dodgeballs.
customer_reviews.author: Mae & Santi Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Buy these for dodgeball!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son had to have a dodgeball game on his birthday. I had originally bought the Rhino Skin "playground" balls for his birthday and those were NOT want he wanted. The other balls are more like "4 square" ball. These balls are soft and the prefect size to grip and throw for dodge ball. These ball come ready to use. He loves them and guards them from his 3 younger brothers.
customer_reviews.author: Lori and Matt

customer_reviews.title: Happy cub scouts
customer_reviews.text: We needed to purchase dodge balls for our cub scout pack. When I received them, they were a little smaller than I had imagined they would be. This ended up being perfect for the little hands of our boys though. I am very happy with them. They throw nicely and the boys had a wonderful time with them.
customer_reviews.author: kwright

customer_reviews.title: Soft good hits.
customer_reviews.text: School uses them. I loved them bought them for myself. Get small ones so harder to catch
customer_reviews.author: gonpab

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dodge balls
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dodge balls. My church has these and I liked them so much I got a set of my own to play with my kids. Nice quality. Soft so when I take a shot to the face it doesn't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great for dodgeball
customer_reviews.text: Firm, strong balls that are good for throwing. Used them in a high school dodgeball tournament. Held up to the big guys throwing them, and they aren't dangerous. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good Dodge Balls
customer_reviews.text: We have bought three sets of these balls. They have been pretty sturdy and have held up well to a lot of use. The only thing we have noticed is that as they age, the foam inside shrinks so that the rubber outside is quite loose. We have have to duct tape a few of the balls, just to tighten the outside rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Tiera K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: his set cam just liked i hop. 6 balls that are well made and packaged. i use them for my church youth group once a week and it feels great when you throw. this is an absolute buy. i will order this same set again and again :)
customer_reviews.author: VOTP

customer_reviews.title: Dodge Duck Dip Dive Dodge
customer_reviews.text: My boys (8, 9 and husband is 36) love playing with these balls. We allow some ball playing inside (which Grandma despises) and these balls are perfect for indoor Dodgeball, but could also be used outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Nursemomma

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and alot softer than our older dodge balls
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and alot softer than our older dodge balls. Also like the variety of colors available. These balls stand up to alot of abuse!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Almost Indistructable  Rhino Balls
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these balls for our after school kids K-5th grade. They love them and play with them every day and they hold up to the 50 kids rough treatment. I am very pleased with the quality and would recommend these balls for indoor play. We use them for our form of dodge-ball. Even being hit by one of these isn't a safety problem. If you want quality balls for kids play that will last, I'd recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Danna

customer_reviews.title: The best thing ever made
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, these are the greatest things ever made. I love this very durable and perfect sized dodgeballs. I very, very highly recommend them to anyone that is involved in any type of college or youth events. Throw these things out there and everyone has a blast. All kids of all ages and sizes love these things, and I know that from experience. A very small 13 year old girl got absolutely smacked by a ball thrown by a college aged guy right in the stomach. I stopped, thinking she was just about to scream bloody murder, but then she laughed and said "that didn't even hurt!" Like I said, these things are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Skrenson

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Bo these for use by my high school students. VERY durable!! They have lasted over a year and our still in good shape. Impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Conley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The youth of our church play dodge ball on Friday nights after home games. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Clouse

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Some many uses beyond dodgeball. I use them for U7 lacrosse.
customer_reviews.author: MJP

customer_reviews.title: A nice dodgeball
customer_reviews.text: They meet our needs for a dodgeball that is easy to throw and not too hard. They will break down if the kids pinch and squash them.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M.

customer_reviews.title: Great dodge balls :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sons cubscout pack. I received them within 3 days and the boys love them! They are well worth the $$ spent! They are much more durable and throwable than the othe r dodge bals we've used and they seem to be holding up to steady usage.
customer_reviews.author: MarthaRC

customer_reviews.title: kids love them - good enough for throwing
customer_reviews.text: kids love them - good enough for throwing, yet light enough to prevent harm when getting hit. the smaller size helps the smaller hands of kids
customer_reviews.author: chris howell

customer_reviews.title: 6" balls soft yet throwable
customer_reviews.text: These balls are about 6 inches wide. They done a good job and held up well. They can be thrown with good speed and distance yet soft enough for my toddlers to get hit with them. Way better than the rocks we used during dodgeball games I the 80's
customer_reviews.author: Slodah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids love these for dodgeball - their favorite game
customer_reviews.author: SHAWN FLORES

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dodgeball
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in order to have a durable ball for dodgeball games that would not injure someone if hit hard. I use them for a youth group, so there tends to be very small people and larger people playing together. They are great because you can throw them very hard and not worry about someone getting hit in the face. I also really like how these balls fly in the air with better accuracy than others I have used. The only thing I would say is they could be just a bit bigger than they are. (6 inches)
customer_reviews.author: Derek Mansker

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun with little sting
customer_reviews.text: They are great for our Youth Group. We have enjoyed hours of fun with these balls as they are durable, yet they are pretty squishy. Some of the HS boys can make they hurt a little but they are better than the the old balls we used in gym back in the 90's.
customer_reviews.author: Redshiftkid

customer_reviews.title: we love dodgeballs
customer_reviews.text: balls were much smaller than expected. don't know if I didn't pay attention to size given or if picture made them seem smaller. we already have 2 sets of this size and were wanting the larger size. even though I now still have to buy larger balls, we will keep this set because it was such a good price and they are used so much and loaned out to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these things countless times because they are great for kids. The skin is pretty tough on them but they do wear out if the kids flatten them or pick at them which is frankly the nature of every kid.
customer_reviews.author: Burns!

customer_reviews.title: Dodgeball set
customer_reviews.text: These balls work well for P.E. classes where regular rubber playground balls could cause excessive 'sting' when thrown by stronger students. They have enough weight to be thrown accurately without having too much 'loft'.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are the foam balls that you are looking for. They are great for dodgeball and just about any sport that involves throwing balls. These do not hurt and I have some students that can throw hard and no one is afraid to play!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Basil

customer_reviews.title: These are the best multi use balls
customer_reviews.text: These are the best multi-use balls. Slightly more dense than the average foam dodgeballs, making them a little easier to control. Good size for many types of games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our family loves these
customer_reviews.text: These dodge balls are the perfect size. The fit in children's hands well. They are also soft and don't hurt when you get hit. We love to clear out our basement and have a war with each other. We have also used them with our church group in the gymnasium. They are very durable and won't tear due to their tough skin. We have our own set and recently bought one for friends. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: julie thomson

customer_reviews.title: Safe way to play dodgeball.
customer_reviews.text: While I wish these were cheaper, the balls are great for playing dodgeball with any age group. So far, they have held up fine under multiple uses in a gym setting with middle school and elementary students, and nobody's gotten hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Wroughton

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: One of our all time best received and most used gifts for our son who got this at age 9. He and his friends love it. They are soft enough for indoors and are gentle on the body and the home. This set is still used as much one year later, as it was the day it was received! Great set of balls.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Tough enough for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for dodgeball with 4th and 5th graders. They play outside on blacktop and I can't believe how well these have held up. Not one mark on them. Skin hasn't been torn. Perfect for throwing fast but not hurting when hit.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for dodgeball at school. They've lasted 3 years, and still look new. That is saying a lot. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: rachel davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. The neon yellow and neon green glow nicely under the black light.
customer_reviews.author: harriken001

customer_reviews.title: Great...
customer_reviews.text: These balls are soft but they will fly...we just played our first game of dodgeball tonight and it was superfun. The balls are great. They don't hurt when they hit you, but you know that you got hit. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: knbhuff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, afforable balls in fun bright colors. Doesn't fall apart from little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Mommalee

customer_reviews.title: Dodgeball!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for dodgeball, and other similar games. A bit expensive, but they are imported from Sweden. You want dodgeballs? These are them!`
customer_reviews.author: Steve

product_meta.title: Champion Sports Rhino Skin Low Bounce Dodgeball Sets - Multiple Colors and Unique Styles
product_meta.description:
OUTSIDE OR IN 
Our Champion Sports dodgeballs are perfect for any number of children’s games, including handball, kickball and four square. From the playground to gym class, these soft but strong balls provide hours of fun and exercise. They’re popular with schools, summer camps, recreational centers, rec leagues and families. 

DURABLE 
Coated with patented Rhino Skin, these balls are built to last. They can withstand years of rough play and regular outdoor use. Designed and made in Sweden, high-tech Rhino Skin is so tough that it’s virtually impossible to tear. The quality is tough to beat. 

FUN FOR ADULTS 
Grownups can join in on the fun, too. Dodgeball is a great party activity for summer BBQs, birthday parties, tournaments or any type of adult gathering. Or, get the whole family outside for some action-packed bonding time. The game is entertaining and interactive, and it’s a great way to sneak in some extra physical activity. 

WON’T STING 
Rhino Skin was designed to be a non-sting coating, so these playground balls won’t hurt or leave bruises when they strike like large rubber balls. Lightweight and spongy, they’re safe for kids to use but rugged enough for teens and adults. 

FOAM CORE 
Our dodgeballs have a low-density foam core that provides just the right amount of bounce. The balls easily fly when thrown to reach long distances, but they won’t bounce all over the place when they land. The foam core prevents huge bounces so the balls stay in the game area, whether that’s a giant gymnasium or a small driveway. 

- Champion Sports Rhino Skin Low Bounce Dodgeballs 
- Patented Non-Sting Rhino Coating 
- Low-Bounce Foam Core 
- Foam Density 28kg/m3
feature_bullets: OUTDOORS OR IN - Perfect for dodgeball and many other children’s games outside on the playground or indoors for gym or PE class
DURABLE - Coated with patented Rhino Skin, these 6 inch balls are tear resistant to withstand rough play and regular outdoor use at school or at home
SAFE FOR YOUNG KIDS - These small dodgeballs won’t sting like classic rubber balls, and they’re easy for younger children to throw and catch
FOAM CORE - The low-density core prevents big bounces so the rhinoskin balls stay in the game area, whether that’s a giant gymnasium or a small driveway
FUN FOR ADULTS - A good time for grownups too, these foam balls can provide families hours entertainment in the yard at a summer BBQ or birthday party
